1.name: The Colt
1.description: Any demon that gets hit by one of your 13 bullets will die!

2.name: Giant Cage
2.description: A huge cage made especially to trap giants

3.name: Edge of Cain
3.description: The first blade made for hunting angels

4.name: Silver Blade
4.description: A double-edged blade specializing in the killing of Archangels

5.name: Necare Hêmítheos
5.description: Physical weapons are not always effective, for the demigods it takes Greco-Latin runes to bring them down

6.name: Deicide
6.description: The knowledge to kill a god can only be gained from external aids
